title: Ponche de Frutas (Fruit Punch)
directions: In a large punch bowl, combine orange juice, lemon juice, grapes, plums and pineapple. Stir in sugar. Pour in tea and crushed ice.
ingredients: 1/2 pound plums, pitted and chopped into small bite-size pieces
1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped into small bite-size pieces
4 cups strong brewed black tea, chilled
